resources.string: You must confirm Storage\npermission access to enjoy\nKeepToo.Allow?
Please switch on Screen Overlay\npermission to preview new\ndetected media on screen
Organize your gallery items on the\ngo with a set of easy to use\nfeatures
Protect your sensitive photos and\nvideos and get safe access
Use on on-screen widget to\norganize your media files fast and\neasy
KeepToo requires access to the following\npermission:Storage Allow ?
Please accept Terms and Privacy Policy
Would you like to take a couple of seconds\nand get to know your best features?
The Temp is a temporary gallery\nthat keep your media files temporarily
After the time frame is ended,the media\nfile will be automatically deleted
Safe is protected gallery that you can\nsave sensitive media files into
The plus + button gives you the option\nto import file,take a photo or open a\nnew folder
